description.original: Track activity of specified projects, Github like activity board
description.translation: 类似Github活跃度面板一样，跟踪指定项目的活跃度

.setDesc('添加项目到跟踪列表. 例如 写`Project 1`来跟踪位于`/Project 1`的项目')
dict..setDesc('Remove project from the tracki: .setDesc('从跟踪列表中删除项目. 例如 `Project 1`')
dict..setDesc('Color for lowest activity. Pla: .setDesc('活跃度最低的颜色. 占位符显示当前颜色.')
dict..setDesc('Color for low activity. Placeh: .setDesc('活跃度次低的颜色. 占位符显示当前颜色.')
dict..setDesc('Color for medium activity. Pla: .setDesc('活跃度中等的颜色. 占位符显示当前颜色.')
dict..setDesc('Color for highest activity. Pl: .setDesc('活跃度最高的颜色. 占位符显示当前颜色..')
dict..setDesc('Text color. Placeholder shows: .setDesc('文本颜色. 占位符显示当前颜色.')
dict..setDesc('Empty color. Placeholder shows: .setDesc('空单元格颜色. 占位符显示当前颜色.')
dict..setDesc('Cell Radius. integer, default: .setDesc('单元格半径. 整数, 默认是 1 = 方形, 数字越大越圆.')
